content: We, Green, see ourselves as a peace loving nation. This means we do not wish to see any military aggression from any party. We have set up plans to work on de-escalating existing tensions with certain countries over the next few days.
we are going to be working on getting the job done.
We want to thank you for your actions during the last days and we appreciate your willingness to reduce tensions and cooperate with us.
